subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With Jorge Posada behind the plate, the Yankees’ pitchers have a 6.31 E.R.A. But the combined E.R.A. with Francisco Cervelli, Jose Molina and Kevin Cash catching is two and a half runs better.
snippet: With Jorge Posada behind the plate, the Yankees’ pitchers have a 6.31 E.R.A. But the combined E.R.A. with Francisco Cervelli, Jose Molina and Kevin Cash catching is two and a half runs better.
